colorScheme.description: The visual color appearance of the component.

defaultIndex.description: The index of the selected tab.

disableRipple.description: If `true`, disable ripple effects when pressing the tab.

index.description: The index of the selected tab.

isFitted.description: If `true`, tabs will stretch to width of the tablist.

isLazy.description: If `true`, rendering of the tab panel's will be deferred until it is selected.

isManual.description:
If `true`, the tabs will be manually activated and display its panel by pressing Space or Enter.

If `false`, the tabs will be automatically activated and their panel is displayed when they receive focus.

lazyBehavior.description:
The lazy behavior of tab panels' content when not active. Only works when `isLazy={true}`.

- `unmount`: The content of inactive tab panels are always unmounted.
- `keepMounted`: The content of inactive tab panels is initially unmounted, but stays mounted when selected.

onChange.description: The callback invoked when the index changes.

orientation.description: The orientation of the tab list.
